titleStmt.title: SII 7.945: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 945. (A.R. No. 316 of 1902). IN THE SAME PLACE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
Inta śrīmeykkirttiyuṭaiya tribhuvaṉaccakkaravattikaḷ śrīkulottuṅkacoḻatevaṟku yāṇṭu 10 5vatu patinaiñca ṣṭiyun tiṅkaḷkiḻamaiyum peṟṟa para
ṇi nāḷ IrājaIrājavaḷanāṭṭut tirumuṉaippāṭit tiruveṇṇainallūrnāṭṭu brahmadeyan tiruveṇṇainallūr sabhaiyom Ivvūr Uṭai tevaṉārkeṇiyiṉ kiḻkaraiyil
Eḻuntaruḷi nāccimāroṭum pūjai koṇṭaruḷukiṟa Āḷuṭaiyanampikku Amutupaṭi yuḷḷiṭṭa niman=taṅkaḷukku Uṭalāka nāṅkaḷ Ivvāḷuṭaiyanampi śrīhastatttile nirvārtta nilamāvatu Ivvūr Iravikulamāṇikkavatik
ku tiruveṇṇainallūrnāṭṭup paṭṭarkaḷātaṉūr Ellaiyil kavinik kaṟṟuṟaipaṭṭa Atirāttirakāṭakaiyājiyār Uṭaiyār Āṭkoṇṭatevarkkuc caṭṭiviḷākamākak koṇṭu viṭṭa nilattukku vaṭakkup patiṉālu
ṭiyumāna kolāl nilam 1/2 Innilam Araiveliyum Ivvāḷuṭaiyanampikku veṇṭum Amutupaṭi yuḷḷiṭṭa nimantaṅkaḷuk kuṭalākak kuṭuttu Innilam Araivelikkuñ cilliṟai peruvari Eccoṟu Āḷamañciyu
kuṭimai Eppeṟpaṭṭiṉa Oṉṟuṅ koḷḷakkaṭavomallātomākavum Ipparicu cantirātittavaṟ cellakkaṭavatāka sammatittu Ivvāḷuṭaiyanampi śrīhastattile nirvārttuc cilālekai paṇṇikkuṭut
tom Ittiruveṇṇainallūr sabhaiyom ... Ittevarkku yāṇṭu 10 5Āvatu Ivvūrk kaḷattūr ciṟiyanampi sahasranen Ivvūril pūjai koṇṭaruḷukiṟa Āḷuṭaiyanampikku Aṭaikkāyamutum IlaiAmutu
m celvitāka Utakapūrvvamākat tāṉampaṇṇikkuṭutta toṭṭanilamāvatu Ivvūr śrīvāṉavaṉmātevivatikku meṟku mummuṭicoḻavāykkālukku vaṭakku muṉṟāṅ kaṇṇāṟṟu Iraṇṭām catirattu 7
Digital edition of SII 7.945 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
